column3:
Tom had to fix some things around the house. He had to fix the door. He had to fix the
ewlinewindow. But before he did anything he had to fix the toilet. Tom called over his best
ewlinefriend Jim to help him. Jim brought with him his friends Molly and Holly. Tom thought that
ewlineJim was going to bring Dolly with him but he didn't. The four of them got to work right
ewlineaway. Fixing the toilet was easy. Fixing the door was also easy but fixing the window was
ewlinevery hard. The window was stuck and could not be opened. They all pushed on the window
ewlinereally hard until finally it opened. Once the window was fixed the four of them made a
ewlinedelicious dinner and talked about all of the good work that they had done. Tom was glad
ewlinethat he had such good friends to help him with his work.
column4: multiple: What was the hardest thing for Tom and his friends to fix?
column9: one: What did Tom need to fix first?
column14: multiple: Jim didn't bring which person with him?
column19: one: Who was Tom's best friend?
